Key Match Events: Faisal Mansour Ali Saleh Al Badri converted a penalty to take the lead for Libya in the 9th minute
Steve Mouine equalized for Benin Republic in the 50th minute, assisted by Junior Olaitan
Junior Olaitan scored a penalty to give Benin Republic the lead in the 62nd minute
Benin Republic managed to withstand late pressure from Libya and held on for a 2-1 victory
Post-Match Reflections: This victory helped Benin Republic recover from their 1-0 loss to Nigeria and move into second place in Group D
Libya, with a draw and a loss, now sit at the bottom of the group
